summary: The module implements a complete mock of the Amazon Kinesis service, providing custom exception types, core data models (streams, shards, records, consumers) with an inâ€‘memory backend, HTTP response routing for Kinesis API actions, and helper utilities for shard iterator token handling and pagination.
business_intent: Allow developers to test and develop applications that interact with Kinesis APIs locally without contacting AWS, supporting unit and integration testing of streaming workflows.
